transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: @keyframes scaler{0%{transform:scale(.89)}50%{transform:scale(1)}to{transform:scale(.89)}}@keyframes heart-move{0%{transform:translate(0) rotate(0deg)}20%{transform:translate(-13px,1px) rotate(-6deg)}40%{transform:translate(-41px,-22px) rotate(-22deg)}60%{transform:translate(-33px,-22px) rotate(-50deg)}80%{transform:translate(40px,-72px) rotate(-50deg)}to{transform:translate(0) rotate(0deg)}}@keyframes like-bumb{0%{transform:scale(.8)}50%{transform:scale(1)}to{transform:scale(.8)}}.student-search-container{background:var(--theme-deafult);width:100vw}.student-search-container .content-container{display:flex;flex:wrap;margin:auto;width:80%}.student-search-container .content-container .student-content{flex:0 0 auto;margin:80px 0;width:67%}.student-search-container .content-container .student-content .content-title{width:70%}.student-search-container .content-container .student-content .motto{font-size:.8rem}.student-search-container .content-container .student-content .job-choice-container{margin-top:8px}.student-search-container .content-container .student-content .job-choice-container span{color:#fff;font-size:.7rem;margin-right:16px}.student-search-container .content-container .image-container{align-content:center;display:flex;flex:0 0 auto;height:340px;margin:30px;max-width:290px;position:relative;width:33%}.student-search-container .content-container .image-container .box-1{flex-grow:1;margin-left:-10.4%;margin-right:-6%;margin-top:-14%;position:relative;width:60%}.student-search-container .content-container .image-container .box-1 img{border-radius:120px;margin-right:30px;margin-top:12px;position:absolute;width:160px}.student-search-container .content-container .image-container .box-1 .circle-container{animation:scaler 4s ease-in-out infinite alternate;position:absolute;right:23px;top:-10px}.student-search-container .content-container .image-container .box-1 .circle-container .inlay-circle-1{border:4px solid transparent;border-radius:50%;border-right-color:#10d1ef;height:180px;transform:rotate(-45deg);width:180px}.student-search-container .content-container .image-container .box-2{background:hsla(0,2%,91%,.5);border-radius:120px;flex-grow:1;margin-left:0;margin-right:-11%;margin-top:19.4%;position:relative;width:40%}.student-search-container .content-container .image-container .box-2 img{height:100%;margin-left:-60px;position:absolute;width:auto}.student-search-container .content-container .image-container .box-2 .circle-container{animation:scaler 4s ease-in-out infinite alternate;bottom:-14px;position:absolute;right:-14px}.student-search-container .content-container .image-container .box-2 .circle-container .inlay-circle-2{border:4px solid transparent;border-radius:50%;border-right-color:#ffc766;height:180px;transform:rotate(45deg);width:180px}.student-search-container .content-container .image-container .heart-icon{animation:heart-move 7s ease-in-out infinite alternate;bottom:6%;left:26%;position:absolute}.student-search-container .content-container .image-container .like-icon{animation:like-bumb 4s ease-in-out infinite alternate;left:100%;position:absolute;top:10.4%;z-index:10}.job-lists-container{margin:auto;text-align:center;width:80%}.job-lists-container .sub-header{color:#6d6c6c;font-size:1rem}.our-past-work-container{margin:auto;width:80%}.our-past-work-container .our-past-work{display:flex;width:100%}.our-past-work-container .our-past-work .image-container{width:50%}.our-past-work-container .our-past-work .image-container img{-o-object-fit:contain;object-fit:contain;-o-object-position:right;object-position:right;width:100%}.our-past-work-container .our-past-work .content-container{padding:50px 0 50px 50px;width:50%}.our-past-work-container .wrap-count{text-align:center}
